title: YOUR CLIENT IS BUGGING THE HELL OUT!

replies.body:
Definitely get your frustration with it and I want to give a hand and get it to be mellow again.  But I'll need just a bit more information about the problem first.  What does bugging out mean exactly?  Does it error out?  Does it disconnect?  What happens exactly?

Hit me up and let me know!

For some reason everything became delayed from messaging to loading into the client itself by logging in, and there were even cases where when a game is found it does not tell me until it passes and I get the dodge penalty. Oh yes, and constant unknown error reports, so many unknown error reports.

Given the errors you are describing, they all seem to be some type of connection issue.  Our servers are trying to display information to the client but it is either getting very delayed, or the information straight up doesn't arrive, causing the unknown errors.  In an effort to fix this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are quite a few steps there, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Feel free to give me a reply if you still don't see any improvement!
Also the infamous black screen after champ select, any news on this?
